meta.description: To start your journey into the Sphere Metaverse. These first few adventures will teach you about the game and collect your first ORBs and Cardpacks
In this tutorial, you will be taught the basics of the Sphere’s core combat module (DuelZ). The bot is easy to beat and will be idle...most of the time.

Each basic Sphere Cardpack contains 5 cards. Open this Cardpack now to proceed. They are your NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens). These items exist on the blockchain and belong to you, and they can be moved to your own wallet or another marketplace to trade for real money.

To play with your NFTs you need to build your first deck. Open the Deck Builder to see the 5 cards from your first Cardpack. Place all 5 cards into your deck by clicking the bottom icons, then press submit.
Now it’s time for a more challenging bot. This bot will move and attack you like a real player. You will need to defeat this bot twice.
Ready to play another player? Time to connect with to Telegram and join the Sphere Metaverse. There you will win more ORBs and NFTs.
